ibis.constellation.impl

Class DistributedConstellation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.constellation.impl.DistributedConstellation

  • public class DistributedConstellation
extends java.lang.Object
    A DistributedConstellation sits between the communication pool and the underlying sub-constellation, which is a MultiThreadedConstellation. Its main tasks are to pass messages from the sub-constellation to the communication pool, and vice versa, and to serve as a facade implementing the Constellation interface for the application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistributedConstellation

        public DistributedConstellation(ConstellationProperties props,
                                ConstellationConfiguration[] c)
                         throws ConstellationCreationException
        Creates a DistributedConstellation.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to use
        c - the constellation configurations to use.
        Throws:
        ConstellationCreationException - is thrown when the communication pool could not be created for some reason
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is thrown when a property value is not recognized

    • Method Detail

      • identifier

        public ConstellationIdentifierImpl identifier()
        Returns the identifier of this constellation.
        Returns:
        the constellation identifier.

      • getConstellation

        public Constellation getConstellation()
        Returns the facade implementing the Constellation interface for a DistributedConstellation.
        Returns:
        the constellation facade.

      • deliverRemoteStealRequest

        public void deliverRemoteStealRequest(StealRequest sr)
        Deals with a steal request delivered by the network (i.e. another node). The steal request is dealt with by passing it on to the sub-constellation below.
        Parameters:
        sr - the steal request message.

      • deliverRemoteStealReply

        public void deliverRemoteStealReply(StealReply sr)
        Deals with a steal reply delivered by the network (i.e. another node). The steal reply is dealt with by checking if it contains any work, and if so, pass it on to the sub-constellation below.
        Parameters:
        sr - the steal reply.

      • deliverRemoteEvent

        public void deliverRemoteEvent(EventMessage re)
        Deals with an event delivered by the network (i.e. another node). The event is dealt with by passing it on to the sub-constellation below.
        Parameters:
        re - the event message.

      • handleStealRequest

        public void handleStealRequest(StealRequest sr)
        Deals with a steal request from the sub-constellation below. The action taken depends on the steal strategy, steal pool, etc.
        Parameters:
        sr - the steal request.

      • handleApplicationMessage

        public boolean handleApplicationMessage(EventMessage m,
                                        boolean enqueueOnFail)
        Handles an event message, either remote or from below. This method gets called, either as a result of someone in our constellation sending a message (bottom up) or as a result of a incoming remote message being forwarded to some other constellation (when an activity is exported).
        Parameters:
        m - the event message
        enqueueOnFail - when set, delivery will be retried when it fails.
        Returns:
        true when the message is dealt with, false otherwise.

      • handleStealReply

        public boolean handleStealReply(StealReply m)
        Receives a steal reply from below, and forwards it to the pool. If the pool fails to deal with the reply, any work is reclaimed, indicated by returning false. Otherwise, if the pool succeeds in forwarding the reply, true is returned. If the pool fails, but there is no work involved, true is returned as well, because no further action is warranted.
        Parameters:
        m - the steal reply
        Returns:
        false if the work in the message must be reclaimed, true otherwise.

      • getConstellationIdentifierFactory

        public ConstellationIdentifierFactory getConstellationIdentifierFactory()
        Provides a constellation identifier factory to produce identifiers for sub-constellation instances (both multithreaded and singlethreaded).
        Returns:
        the constellation identifier factory.

      • belongsTo

        public void belongsTo(StealPool[] belongsTo)
        Informs this constellation to which pool it belongs. This method is called from the MultiThreadedConstellation below. The tags from the pool get passed on to the communication layer, allowing this layer to build a picture of which pool is running where.
        Parameters:
        belongsTo - the pools to which this constellation belongs.

      • stealsFrom

        public void stealsFrom(StealPool[] stealsFrom)
        Informs this constellation from which pool it is stealStrategy. This method is called from the MultiThreadedConstellation below. The tags from the pool get passed on to the communication layer, allowing this layer to build a picture of which nodes we are interested in when stealStrategy.
        Parameters:
        stealsFrom - the pools from which this constellation is stealStrategy.

      • getProfiling

        public Profiling getProfiling()
